content: To find him, you'll need to make your way through the Valley of Ecstasy after crossing the Bitter Lake, and head through the Path of Longevity toward the large pagoda tower rising above the New Thunderclap Temple in the distance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Kalpa-Wave.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Kalpa-Wave', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
To find him, you'll need to make your way through the Valley of Ecstasy after crossing the Bitter Lake, and head through the Path of Longevity toward the large pagoda tower rising above the New Thunderclap Temple in the distance.
